item.title: stable@2016-10-20 to unstable@2017-02-04
item.description:
Mic92 convinced me to try out unstable again. 31c72ce2 -> f66d7823

new problems i managed to solve

awesome4.0 introduced breaking api changes

Due to the fact that the whole awesomecfg is code, everything exploded. My temporary solution was to replace some of the old config default parts with the new …

item.title: unstable@2016-07-20 to stable@2016-10-20
item.description:
Peer pressure resulted from switching back to 16.09 stable branch 125ffff -> 31c72ce2

new problems i managed to solve

Redis does not start up

item.title: stable@2016-06-11 to unstable@2016-07-20
item.description:
Accidentally updated from stable channel to unstable: 0546a4a -> 125ffff

new problems i managed to solve

Xorg does not accept connections from system users

not sure how long it didn't work but xhost fixes it.

services.xserver.displayManager.sessionCommands = ''
  ${pkgs.xorg.xhost}/bin/xhost +local:
'';

msmtp stopped working

trying to start …

item.title: Blog Introduction
item.description:
I decided i will share my adventures through NixOS and more specifically following either the NixOS Unstable Channel or the Latest NixOS Stable Channel.

The Blog posts will contain the Git Hash and the time i updated. It will be mostly a short problem description and how (or how not …
